person.persName: Leonard Y. Button (Shelby County, Kentucky, blacksmith)

body.p: Shelby County, Kentucky, blacksmith. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret Rice Button in Oldham County, Kentucky, on October 15, 1833. Father of John Button, Emily Button, and Charles Button. Married to Helena H. Rucker Button in Shelby County, Kentucky, on April 11, 1848. Married to Elizabeth Haley Button in Shelby County on March 19, 1851. Father of Nancy Button and Bettie Button. Married to Lucinda Frazier Button in Shelby County on May 28, 1855. Blacksmith in Shelby County in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Shelby County in 1850. Blacksmith in Shelby County in 1860.
